channel.title: Frequently Asked Questions on PrestaShop Developer Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Frequently Asked Questions on PrestaShop Developer Documentation

item.title: Product FAQ
item.description: Product FAQ Product cover Product cover Q: How can I override the cover image of my products? A: By default, when a product is displayed in a list its cover image is used, it is configurable in the BackOffice and is set in product properties via the cover_image_id key. If you want to change this default behaviour you can use the actionGetProductPropertiesAfter in your module and change this key.

item.title: Shipping FAQ
item.description: Shipping FAQ Shipping information How do I add a service fee to an order? Shipping information Q: Where and how should I read and write the following informations to be sure that my module is compatible with every shipping modules: Tracking number Carrier name Estimated delivery date Real delivery date A: These details are stored at different places. Carrier details Information related to a shipping (= delivery method) may be found / stored with the class Carrier.
